channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report E-2023120266
item.description:
Report E-2023120266

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-21T18:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-01
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2023120617
item.description:
Report X-2023120617

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-04
  • City: GAITHERSBURG
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was unloaded and placed on the conveyor belt, leakage was found, package was remove from belt and taken to designated hazmat cage DescribePack: 1 bottle in package had a loose cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in hazmat container and taken to designated hazmat area
